item.title: Starting With C
item.description: These are a few of my notes studying C from books such as Effective C as practice an king’s book C99 practice questions Note that I will be summarizing these notes even more with second draft, and then I’d rewrite them in a more friendly manner the third time pages: 0-12(13) of Effective C Objectives: Build a simple C program Compile and run the simple C program Compiler options Portiablity Issues Quick Read Takeaways Simple hello world program #include <stdio.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am a graduting Computer Engineer. This site is meant to be minimal, allowing myself to simply share my ideas with ease. Any projects will be linked here with proper practical Demos /code and with research citations if applicable. In this site I’ll be sharing: Useful development tutorials and best practices that I know of or learned recently. Courses and Books reviews, with simple enjoyable summaries (mostly techie stuff, but no promises) Briefs on studies,projects,research etc that I have done or peaked my interest.
